resources.string: SoundFiles
Folders
Displays folders containing sound files in alphabetical order. For example : Camera, Recordings, Whatsapp, etc.
1) Auto-detect folders containing sound files on the device
2) Generate a sorted list of detected folders
3) Display the sorted list on the screen
Folder Name
Displays the sound files in alphabetical order in the folder along with their associated pictures.
1) Detect sound files and their meta data like pictures in that folder.
2) Sort the generated list of sound files
3) Display the sorted list of sound files with their pic and file name alongside.
Sound File Name
Plays the sound file and displays the album cover if available and has player options like play/pause, previous, next. In addition, sound files can also be shared and deleted.
1) Play the sound file at a given location on device. Also display the album cover if available.
2) Associate play/pause, prev, next options
3) Implement share and delete options
1) Retrieve data from content provider MediaStore.
2) Use ListView to display a list of folders.
1) Use listView to display a list of audio files.
1) Use MediaPlayer class to play music at a given location.
2) Use MediaStore for album art.
3) Start a Service using service abstract class.
4) Use ShareActionProvider to share sound file.
